locations.name: Split
locations.description: Historic coastal city with stunning Adriatic views and ancient architecture.

locations.name: Cape Town
locations.description: Where mountains meet the sea, offering diverse outdoor adventures.

locations.name: Denver
locations.description: Mile-high city with access to Rocky Mountain adventures.

locations.name: Portland
locations.description: Eclectic city surrounded by forests, rivers, and mountains.

locations.name: San Diego
locations.description: Sunny coastal city with perfect surf and nearby mountain escapes.

locations.name: Seattle
locations.description: Surrounded by water and mountains with vibrant urban culture.

adventures.title: SURF & SNOWBOARD SOCAL
adventures.subtitle: Surfing Snowboarding - San Diego, California, United States
adventures.summary: We will start in the vintage surf town of OB at the shop located at 5022 Santa Monica Ave. Ocean Beach, San Diego. OB is the greatest place to learn to surf, it offers a wide variety of waves within a small radius. The family dog can even score a couple rides at dog beach. San Diego offers up some gorgeous hikes along with some breathtaking views.

itinerary.title: Ocean Beach Surf Day
itinerary.description: Start in Ocean Beach, learn to surf at various spots in the area. Evening yoga session to relax muscles.

itinerary.title: Coastal Adventure
itinerary.description: Explore Southern San Diego's favorite surf spots and hidden coastal gems.

itinerary.title: Mountain Experience
itinerary.description: Venture to Bear Mountain for snowboarding or surf another break depending on season.

adventures.meetingPoint: 5022 Santa Monica Ave, Ocean Beach, San Diego

adventures.title: ON LOCATION PHOTOGRAPHY INSTRUCTION
adventures.subtitle: Cape Town, South Africa
adventures.summary: Learn professional photography techniques while exploring Cape Town's most scenic locations. Suitable for all skill levels from beginners to advanced photographers looking to refine their craft.

itinerary.title: Golden Hour at Signal Hill
itinerary.description: Capture breathtaking sunset views over the Atlantic Ocean and city skyline.

itinerary.title: Table Mountain Composition
itinerary.description: Master landscape photography techniques with Table Mountain as our subject.

adventures.title: DALMATIAN COAST KAYAK ADVENTURE
adventures.subtitle: Split, Croatia
adventures.summary: Paddle through the crystal-clear waters of the Adriatic, exploring hidden coves and islands near Split.

itinerary.title: Marjan Hill to Bene Beach
itinerary.description: Beginner-friendly paddle with stops at secluded beaches.

itinerary.title: Island Hopping Adventure
itinerary.description: Visit Šolta and Brač islands with lunch at a traditional konoba.

adventures.title: ROCKY MOUNTAIN SUMMIT CHALLENGE
adventures.subtitle: Hiking - Denver, Colorado, United States
adventures.summary: Conquer two 14,000-ft peaks in the Rockies with an experienced mountaineer. Includes alpine skills training and overnight camping above treeline.

itinerary.title: Grays Peak Ascent
itinerary.description: Hike to 14,270ft with technical terrain instruction

itinerary.title: Torreys Peak Traverse
itinerary.description: Summit neighboring 14,267ft peak via dramatic ridge

adventures.title: COLUMBIA GORGE WATERFALLS TOUR
adventures.subtitle: Hiking - Portland, Oregon, United States
adventures.summary: Discover 5 spectacular waterfalls within 90 minutes of Portland, including hidden gems only locals know about.

adventures.title: PUGET SOUND WHALE WATCHING
adventures.subtitle: Boat Tour - Seattle, Washington, United States
adventures.summary: Spot orcas, humpbacks and gray whales from our custom expedition vessel with marine biologists on board.

adventures.title: ANCIENT SPLIT WALKING TOUR
adventures.subtitle: Cultural - Split, Croatia
adventures.summary: Explore 1700 years of history in Diocletian's Palace with a local archaeologist guide.

adventures.title: TABLE MOUNTAIN RAPPELLING
adventures.subtitle: Adventure - Cape Town, South Africa
adventures.summary: Descend 100m cliffs on Table Mountain with panoramic views of Cape Town below you.

hosts.name: Enk Holmgren
hosts.bio: Professional surf and snowboard instructor with 10 years experience guiding adventures throughout Southern California. Certified yoga instructor and passionate about sharing the stoke of outdoor adventures.

hosts.name: Lerato Mbeki
hosts.bio: Award-winning photographer with exhibitions in Cape Town and Johannesburg. Specializes in landscape and adventure photography education.

hosts.name: Ivan Horvat
hosts.bio: Croatian national kayaking champion turned adventure guide. Knows every hidden gem along the Dalmatian coast.

hosts.name: Sarah McKinley
hosts.bio: IFMGA-certified mountain guide with 15 years of experience leading technical ascents in the Rockies.

hosts.name: Ethan Rivers
hosts.bio: Native Oregonian who has explored every trail in the Columbia Gorge since childhood.

hosts.name: Marine Discovery Team
hosts.bio: Team of marine biologists dedicated to ethical wildlife encounters and ocean conservation.

hosts.name: Antonia Ivanović
hosts.bio: PhD in Archaeology specializing in Roman history. Licensed tour guide since 2010.

hosts.name: Thando Nkosi
hosts.bio: Professional climber and certified rope access technician with 8 years of guiding experience.

reviews.author: AdventureSeeker123
reviews.comment: Amazing experience! Enk and Kylee made sure we had the best time surfing and snowboarding. The yoga sessions were the perfect way to recover after active days.

reviews.author: TravelingFamily2023
reviews.comment: Great adventure for our family of four. Kids loved the surfing and we parents enjoyed trying snowboarding for the first time!

reviews.author: PhotoEnthusiast
reviews.comment: Lerato transformed how I see and capture landscapes. My Instagram has never looked better!

reviews.author: PeakBagger2023
reviews.comment: Sarah's knowledge of mountain safety gave us complete confidence on exposed terrain. Summiting two 14ers in one trip was epic!

reviews.author: NatureLover
reviews.comment: Ethan showed us waterfalls we never would have found on our own. His plant identification skills added so much to the experience.

reviews.author: WhaleWatcher
reviews.comment: Saw a pod of orcas hunting! The biologists' commentary made it truly educational.

reviews.author: KayakExplorer
reviews.comment: Ivan showed us secret beaches only accessible by kayak. The homemade lunch at the konoba was incredible!

reviews.author: HistoryBuff
reviews.comment: Antonia brought Diocletian's Palace to life with her stories. Saw details I would have completely missed on my own.
